full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement: Supply of Specialized Fabric**

## Request for Proposal (RFP) Title
Supply of Specialty Fabrics or Cloth (UNSPSC: 11162100)

## Tender Information
- **Reference Number**: CB-4879-71272084
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Solicitation Number**: W8485-247630/A
- **Publication Date**: April 18, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: May 30, 2023, 2:00 PM (Local Time)
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 31, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 24, 2024

## Tender Status
The tender is currently expired.

## Procurement Method and Selection Criteria
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Performance Requirements and Items to be Supplied
The procurement is for the supply of 10,000 units of Strip, Coated Cloth, Part No.: MIL-C-19002 Type II, to be delivered to 7 CFSD, Edmonton. Bidders are encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.

## Contracting Entity and Contact Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Bid Receiving – Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Place du Portage, Phase III Core 0B2, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
- **Contact Information**: Debbie Bergeron, debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca

## Submission Requirements
- The bid document can be downloaded from the Canada Buy Service website.
- Interested bidders must submit their complete bid documents electronically via the epost Connect service by the closing date.
- Sellers are encouraged to transmit their bids well in advance of the closing date to mitigate risks of transmission errors.

Note that some sensitive information may have been removed, while descriptions of the work have been modified for fairness and use without discrimination. Conduct your own research or additional review if necessary. Interested bidders must follow the guidelines specified in the tender documents, available on the Canada Buy Service website.

( words: 280 )  Approximately.  Finally, the entry remains **clean and well-formatted in markdown format.** I also made the common modification of standardizing date and time format. Make sure to establish your conversion between the modified text and your specific “clean-up”
